name: Casino Game (KD_Games)
description:
Story:
You wake up in a very bare and abandoned Ambulance in the parking lot of a Casino. The only thing you remember was the days previous you had a very expensive medical procedure and no way to pay the bills, so you had to borrow the money from a Loan Shark. The problem is, this Loan Shark will actually kidnap you and force you to pay back your debt through their very own Casino.
Play various games around the Casino to gain enough money to fully pay back your loan, own the Casino, or to put this all behind you once you're free.

Games include: Slots ($1, $5, $25++), 2 Card Draw  game, Snail racing, looting cars, looting garbages, Darts, Dice, Basketball, Bowling, Skee-ball type game, and a Plinko style game.
Game has a functioning inventory so you are able to collect and buy/sell items to the shop on the 2nd floor. Make your way up the floors of the Casino to experience all the  different games the Casino has to offer. Don't forget to check out the rooftop patio, or even claim your own hotel room.
2 Short and repetitive quests. (Giving Dice or Card to patrons). These quests are given out by the down-on-his-luck gentleman at the back of the Casino.
You can also hire some Casino patrons (through the Hireman outside the shop on the 2nd floor) to play some games for you to optimize profits if need be. At the moment there is only a Slot Machine Expert to hire, but plan to add other games in the future. There are 4 options: 2x profit, lose hire amount, % of patrons winnings, or win $50.
